Class Client

java.lang.Object
  Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalClient, RemoteClient
public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class for clients in a maze.

Version:
$Id: Client.java 343 2004-01-24 03:43:45Z geoffw $
Author:
Geoffrey Washburn <geoffw@cis.upenn.edu>

Field Detail

maze

protected Maze maze
The maze where the client is located. null if not presently in a maze.

listenerSet

private java.util.Set listenerSet
Maintain a set of listeners.

name

private java.lang.String name
Name of the client.

Constructor Detail

Client

protected Client(java.lang.String name)
Create a new client with the specified name.

Method Detail

registerMaze

public void registerMaze(Maze maze)
Register this Client as being contained by the specified Maze. Naturally a Client cannot be registered with more than one Maze at a time.

Parameters:
maze - The Maze in which the Client is being placed.

unregisterMaze

public void unregisterMaze()
Inform the Client that it has been taken out of the Maze in which it is located. The Client must already be registered with a Maze before this can be called.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Get the name of this Client.

Returns:
A String naming the Client.

getPoint

public Point getPoint()
Obtain the location of this Client.

Returns:
A Point specifying the location of the Client.

getOrientation

public Direction getOrientation()
Find out what direction this Client is presently facing.

Returns:
A Cardinal Direction.

addClientListener

public void addClientListener(ClientListener cl)
Add an object to be notified when this Client performs an action.

Parameters:
cl - An object that implementing the cl interface.

removeClientListener

public void removeClientListener(ClientListener cl)
Remove an object from the action notification queue.

Parameters:
cl - The ClientListener to remove.

forward

protected boolean forward()
Move the client forward.

Returns:
true if move was successful, otherwise false.

backup

protected boolean backup()
Move the client backward.

Returns:
true if move was successful, otherwise false.

turnLeft

protected void turnLeft()
Turn the client ninety degrees counter-clockwise.

turnRight

protected void turnRight()
Turn the client ninety degrees clockwise.

fire

protected boolean fire()
Fire a projectile.

Returns:
true if a projectile was successfully launched, otherwise false.

notifyMoveForward

private void notifyMoveForward()
Notify listeners that the client moved forward.

notifyMoveBackward

private void notifyMoveBackward()
Notify listeners that the client moved backward.

notifyTurnRight

private void notifyTurnRight()
Notify listeners that the client turned right.

notifyTurnLeft

private void notifyTurnLeft()
Notify listeners that the client turned left.

notifyFire

private void notifyFire()
Notify listeners that the client fired.

notifyListeners

private void notifyListeners(ClientEvent ce)
Send a the specified ClientEvent to all registered listeners

Parameters:
ce - Event to be sent.
